summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2465 for the improvement of Weller Street, from Maynard Avenue to Twelfth Avenue South; Maynard Avenue, Eighth Avenue South, Ninth Avenue South and Twelfth Avenue South, each from King Street to Weller Street; Seventh Avenue South from King Street to Dearborn Street, all in The City of Seattle, by construction of concrete walks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 26600 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
